data.title: Head of State and World Leader Visits
data.meta_description: Head of State and World Leader Visits. Click on Thumbnails below for larger images which are all available in higher resolution. You can download higher resolution images (400 dpi JPG, 4-5MB) of most of these photos from the National Archives Catalog.
data.text:
Click on Thumbnails below for larger images which are all available in higher resolution. You can download higher resolution images (400 dpi JPG, 4-5MB) of most of these photos from the National Archives Catalog. For use of Reagan Library audiovisual materials please read the AV disclaimer.

Order Form

Order Information and Pricing

Main White House Photograph Collection Galleries Page

C388-4, President Reagan and Nancy Reagan with Prime Minister Edward Seaga of Jamaica and his wife Mitzy Seaga on state floor balcony. 01/28/1981.

C439-13, President Reagan meeting with President Chun Doo Hwan of South Korea in the oval office. 02/02/1981.

C445-24, President Reagan walking with Soon Ja Lee, wife of President Chun Doo Hwan of South Korea with Nancy Reagan, George Bush, Barbara Bush in the Cross Hall. 02/02/1981.

C452-23, President Reagan, Chun Doo Hwan, Nancy Reagan, Soon Ja Lee, George Bush, and Barbara Bush during the departure ceremony President Chun Doo Hwan of South Korea. 02/02/1981.

C872-9, President Reagan and Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher of the United Kingdom on the south lawn during her Arrival Ceremony. 02/26/1981.

C881-32, President Reagan and Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher of the United Kingdom talking in the Blue Room during her state visit. 02/26/1981.

C916-14A, President Reagan, Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher, Denis Thatcher, Nancy Reagan and Barbara Bush in the Yellow Oval Room during a state dinner for Prime Minister Thatcher of the United Kingdom. 02/26/1981.

C918-12, President Reagan laughing while Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher of the United Kingdom is giving a Toast during her State Dinner in the State Dining Room. 02/26/1981.

C921-25, President Reagan, Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher of the United Kingdom, Nancy Reagan and Denis Thatcher walking along the cross hall at the State Dinner. 02/26/1981.

C924-26, Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher of the United Kingdom talking with Nancy Reagan in the Blue Room during at the State Dinner. 02/26/1981.

C1861-11A,President Reagan and Nancy Reagan greet Prime Minister Suzuki of Japan before a State Dinner at the White House. 05/07/1981.

C1872-18, President Reagan and Nancy Reagan greet Prime Minister Suzuki of Japan before a State Dinner at the White House. 05/07/1981.

C2064-20, President Reagan meeting with Chancellor Helmut Schmidt of West Germany in the oval office. 05/21/1981.

C2084-11, State Dinner arrival of President Reagan, Nancy Reagan, Helmut Schmidt, and Loki Schmidt on North Portico during State Visit of Chancellor Schmidt of West Germany. 05/21/1981.

C2300-5, President Reagan greets President Jose Lopez Portillo of Mexico at the Diplomatic Entrance with Leonore Annenberg and White House staff looking on. 06/08/1981.

C2726-10A, State arrival of Prime Minister Fraser of Australia and greeted by President Reagan and Nancy Reagan at Diplomatic entrance. 06/30/1981.

C2731-17, President Reagan examining a saddle that Prime Minister Malcolm Fraser of Australia has given to the President and the United States during his State visit in the oval office. 06/30/1981.

C2752-26A, President Reagan, Nancy Reagan, Malcolm Fraser, and Tamie Fraser arriving for the State dinner held for Prime Minister Fraser of Australia. 06/30/1981.

C3416-16A, President Reagan and Egyptian President Anwar Sadat on the South Lawn. 08/05/1981.

C3406-10A, Egyptian President Anwar Sadat signs the guest book as President Reagan looks on in the Oval Office. 08/05/1981

C3425-7, Egyptian President Anwar Sadat presents a gift, "Collar of the Nile " to President Reagan and Nancy Reagan in the Blue room. 08/05/1981.

C3454-19A, President Reagan having a breakfast meeting with Egyptian President Anwar Sadat with George Bush, Alexander Haig, Richard Allen, Kamal Hasan, Ali Mansur Muhammad Hasan and Osama el Baz in the President's Dining room. 08/06/1981.

C3744-7, Arrival Ceremony for State Visit of Prime Minister Menachem Begin of Israel on the south lawn. 09/09/1981.

C3756-8, President Reagan and Nancy Reagan walking with Prime Minister Menachem Begin of Israel at the State arrival for a State Dinner in the grand foyer. 09/09/1981.

C3766-31, President Reagan and Nancy Reagan walking with Prime Minister Menachem Begin of Israel and Hassia Begin in Cross Hall as they depart after State visit. 09/09/1981.

C4610-9, President Reagan and President Francois Mitterrand of France at the Battle of Yorktown Bicentennial celebration in Virginia. 10/19/1981.

C4877-10, President Reagan, Nancy Reagan, Queen Noor, and King Hussein I in Yellow Oval Room posing for group photo before the State Dinner for King Hussein of Jordan. 11/02/1981.

C4886-10A, President Reagan and Nancy Reagan greet King Hussein I and Queen Noor of Jordan for the State Dinner at the North Portico of the White House. 11/02/1981.

C5132-9A, President Reagan and Nancy Reagan greeting President Luis Herrera Campins of Venezuela at the North Portico for a State visit. 11/17/1981.

C5160-8A, President Reagan, Nancy Reagan, Luis Herrera Campins, and Mrs Herrera Campins on the North Portico before a state dinner for President Luis Herrera Campins of Venezuela. 11/17/1981.
